title: Virtual World Game-Based Science Learning Project

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational science concepts understanding and basic mobile device operation skills
context.additional_context: Scientific problem-solving projects in a smartphone-centric limited-technology environment. Strengthens experimental design and data analysis skills using virtual world-based gamification elements.

learning_goals: Over 80% of learners complete projects by applying scientific inquiry processes to game mechanics (quests, reward systems) in virtual environments
Generate and apply at least three scientific problem-solving strategies through collaborative game-based tasks
Using mobile-friendly virtual lab tools, achieve over 90% accuracy in quantitative data collection and analysis processes

resources: Gamification Elements Template (Quest Board, Achievement System)
constraints.tech_requirements: Limited tech environment (no PC, smartphone only)

difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
